languages.text: "Третьим шло испытание справедливости. Приняв на себя роль судьи отступника нашей веры, ты заявил{mf||а} свое право влиять на баланс жизни и смерти, нарушенный заблудшей душой. Ну а четвертое — испытание долга, ибо долг всегда ведет к смерти. Не ведая страха и признавая свою цель в служении Неумирающему, мы готовы исполнить свой долг перед Ним. Ты тоже доказал{mf||а} свою готовность, и четыре испытания привели тебя сюда".

"The third was the trial of justice. In assuming the role of judge for an apostate of our faith, you declared your right to influence the balance of life and death that the errant soul had upset. And the fourth was the trial of duty, for duty always leads to death. We are prepared to render our duty to the Undying One, fearless and accepting of our purpose, which is to serve Him. You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."
languages.original_text: "Третьим шло испытание справедливости. Приняв на себя роль судьи отступника нашей веры, ты заявил{mf||а} свое право влиять на баланс жизни и смерти, нарушенный заблудшей душой. Ну а четвертое — испытание долга, ибо долг всегда ведет к смерти. Не ведая страха и признавая свою цель в служении Неумирающему, мы готовы исполнить свой долг перед Ним. Ты тоже доказал{mf||а} свою готовность, и четыре испытания привели тебя сюда".

You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."

languages.text: "Die dritte Prüfung war die der Gerechtigkeit. Indem Ihr über einen Apostaten unseres Glaubens gerichtet habt, habt Ihr Euer Recht erklärt, das Gleichgewicht von Leben und Tod zu beeinflussen, das die vom Weg abgekommene Seele gestört hatte. Und die vierte Prüfung war die der Pflicht, denn die Pflicht führt immer zum Tod. Wir sind bereit, unsere Pflicht dem Todlosen gegenüber zu erfüllen und unsere Bestimmung, Ihm zu dienen, furchtlos zu akzeptieren. Auch Ihr habt Euch als bereit erwiesen und die vier Prüfungen haben euch hierher geführt."
languages.original_text: "The third was the trial of justice. In assuming the role of judge for an apostate of our faith, you declared your right to influence the balance of life and death that the errant soul had upset. And the fourth was the trial of duty, for duty always leads to death. We are prepared to render our duty to the Undying One, fearless and accepting of our purpose, which is to serve Him. You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."

Auch Ihr habt Euch als bereit erwiesen und die vier Prüfungen haben euch hierher geführt."

languages.text: «La tercera era la prueba de la justicia. Al adoptar el papel de juez frente a un apóstata de nuestra fe, declaró su derecho para influir en el equilibrio de la vida y la muerte que el alma errante había perturbado. Y la cuarta era la prueba del deber, pues el deber siempre conduce a la muerte. Estamos preparados para cumplir con nuestro deber hacia el Inmortal, sin miedo y aceptando nuestro propósito, que es servirle. Usted también ha demostrado estar preparad{mf|o|a}, y la cuarta prueba le ha traído hasta aquí».
languages.original_text: "The third was the trial of justice. In assuming the role of judge for an apostate of our faith, you declared your right to influence the balance of life and death that the errant soul had upset. And the fourth was the trial of duty, for duty always leads to death. We are prepared to render our duty to the Undying One, fearless and accepting of our purpose, which is to serve Him. You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."

traits.locale_text: «La tercera era la prueba de la justicia. Al adoptar el papel de juez frente a un apóstata de nuestra fe, declaró su derecho para influir en el equilibrio de la vida y la muerte que el alma errante había perturbado. Y la cuarta era la prueba del deber, pues el deber siempre conduce a la muerte. Estamos preparados para cumplir con nuestro deber hacia el Inmortal, sin miedo y aceptando nuestro propósito, que es servirle. Usted también ha demostrado estar preparad{mf|o|a}, y la cuarta prueba le ha traído hasta aquí».

languages.text: 「3つ目は正義の審判でした。我らの信仰に背いたものに対する裁判官の役割を引き受けることで、過ちを犯した魂が乱した生と死のバランスに影響を与える権利を行使したのです。そして4つ目が役目の試練です。役目は常に死につながっています。我らは不死の者に仕えるという目的を恐れずに受け入れ、義務を果たす心構えがあります。陛下もその覚悟を証明なさいました。そして、4つ目の試練が御身をこちらへと導いたのです」
languages.original_text: "The third was the trial of justice. In assuming the role of judge for an apostate of our faith, you declared your right to influence the balance of life and death that the errant soul had upset. And the fourth was the trial of duty, for duty always leads to death. We are prepared to render our duty to the Undying One, fearless and accepting of our purpose, which is to serve Him. You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."

traits.locale_text: 「3つ目は正義の審判でした。我らの信仰に背いたものに対する裁判官の役割を引き受けることで、過ちを犯した魂が乱した生と死のバランスに影響を与える権利を行使したのです。そして4つ目が役目の試練です。役目は常に死につながっています。我らは不死の者に仕えるという目的を恐れずに受け入れ、義務を果たす心構えがあります。陛下もその覚悟を証明なさいました。そして、4つ目の試練が御身をこちらへと導いたのです」

languages.text: “第三个试炼是关于正义的试炼。当您担任仲裁者的职位，为背叛我们信仰的叛徒定罪时，您便已经宣布——您有权纠正不义之人为生死平衡带来的干扰。第四个试炼，则是关于责任的试炼，因为行使职责必将带来死亡。我们已经做好了准备，向不死之神尽我们的责任。我们无所畏惧地接受了我们的目标，那便是为祂效力，而您也已经证明您做好了准备。至于第四个试炼，则把您带到了这里。”
languages.original_text: "The third was the trial of justice. In assuming the role of judge for an apostate of our faith, you declared your right to influence the balance of life and death that the errant soul had upset. And the fourth was the trial of duty, for duty always leads to death. We are prepared to render our duty to the Undying One, fearless and accepting of our purpose, which is to serve Him. You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."

traits.locale_text: “第三个试炼是关于正义的试炼。当您担任仲裁者的职位，为背叛我们信仰的叛徒定罪时，您便已经宣布——您有权纠正不义之人为生死平衡带来的干扰。第四个试炼，则是关于责任的试炼，因为行使职责必将带来死亡。我们已经做好了准备，向不死之神尽我们的责任。我们无所畏惧地接受了我们的目标，那便是为祂效力，而您也已经证明您做好了准备。至于第四个试炼，则把您带到了这里。”

languages.text: « La troisième épreuve est celle de la justice. En endossant le rôle de Juge face à un apostat ayant renié notre foi, vous avez affirmé votre droit à rétablir l'équilibre entre la vie et la mort que cette âme égarée avait compromis. Quant à la quatrième épreuve, c'est celle du devoir, car le devoir mène toujours à la mort. Nous sommes prêts à accomplir notre devoir, qui consiste à servir l'Immortel, sans crainte et dans l'acceptation totale de notre vocation. Vous aussi, vous avez prouvé que vous étiez fin {mf|prêt|prête}, et c'est ainsi que les quatre épreuves vous ont {mf|conduit|conduite} jusqu'ici. »
languages.original_text: "The third was the trial of justice. In assuming the role of judge for an apostate of our faith, you declared your right to influence the balance of life and death that the errant soul had upset. And the fourth was the trial of duty, for duty always leads to death. We are prepared to render our duty to the Undying One, fearless and accepting of our purpose, which is to serve Him. You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."

traits.locale_text: « La troisième épreuve est celle de la justice. En endossant le rôle de Juge face à un apostat ayant renié notre foi, vous avez affirmé votre droit à rétablir l'équilibre entre la vie et la mort que cette âme égarée avait compromis. Quant à la quatrième épreuve, c'est celle du devoir, car le devoir mène toujours à la mort. Nous sommes prêts à accomplir notre devoir, qui consiste à servir l'Immortel, sans crainte et dans l'acceptation totale de notre vocation. Vous aussi, vous avez prouvé que vous étiez fin {mf|prêt|prête}, et c'est ainsi que les quatre épreuves vous ont {mf|conduit|conduite} jusqu'ici. »

languages.text: "Üçüncü imtihan, adalet imtihanıydı. İnancımızdan dönen birisi için yargıç rolünü üstlenerek yoldan çıkan kişinin bozduğu yaşam ve ölüm dengesine nüfuz etme hakkınızı ilan ettiniz. Dördüncü imtihan ise vazife imtihanıydı. Zira vazife, her daim ölümle sonlanır. Bizler, korkmadan ve amacımızı kabul ederek Vazifemizi Ölmeyen'e teslim etmeye hazırız. Amacımız ise O'na hizmettir. Siz de hazırlıklı olduğunuzu kanıtladınız ve bu dört imtihan sayesinde buraya geldiniz."
languages.original_text: "The third was the trial of justice. In assuming the role of judge for an apostate of our faith, you declared your right to influence the balance of life and death that the errant soul had upset. And the fourth was the trial of duty, for duty always leads to death. We are prepared to render our duty to the Undying One, fearless and accepting of our purpose, which is to serve Him. You, too, have proven yourself prepared, and the four trials have brought you here."
